Name: 回忆画册~MemoriesAlbum~
About the game: This work is the first youth love comedy visual novel produced by ruby spring production group with the contemporary campus as the background. This work adopts the story mode of double female owners. The two female owners have their own corresponding endings. The player can decide the route of the endings from the first person perspective through options. STORY AI Lian, the protagonist who has entered the third year of junior high school, was assigned to her classmate Xia Xiaomeng, who has been in the same class since the beginning of primary school. However, although we have known her for nearly nine years, we have hardly communicated with each other, and the atmosphere between them is very awkward. However, after getting along with Xia Xiaomeng for a period of time, I found that I had an unexpected chat with this quiet girl, and the relationship between the two people gradually became better. But then because of something, the relationship just became good, but the two gradually drifted apart. Until the day of graduation from junior high school, the two entered different high schools. Therefore, Ailian made an agreement with Xia Xiaomeng PROFILE AiLian dramatis personae XiaXiaomeng CV：Taxianwutong One of the heroines of the film, and Ailian have been classmates since primary school. After being assigned to the same desk in the third year of junior high school, the relationship began to get closer QinXin CV：Sanfangfang One of the heroines of this work, AI Lian, met a girl on the first day of high school. Unexpectedly, she was a classmate XiaoChen CV：Beicun AI Lian's only family and friends were in the same class until high school. STAFF Plan：RubyHaruSoftware Planner：CainHeel Original painting：薛薛薛疯子_kyo CG：薛薛薛疯子_kyo、砰砰pengpeng Background：考拉兄、菜玖玖 Script：CainHeel Program：CainHeel Theme：《回忆画册》 Singer：小捷 Write a word：尔羽策 Compose music：玩音符的老舰长 System：Renpy BGM：佑萌 CM：等等（等一壳草）
